name: Lord of the Rings - Obtain all 4 rings from DKS
description: Does not include ring of life.

name: Obtain 4 Venator Shards
Obtain two purples from Chambers of Xeric
Obtain Gilded or 3rd Age from a clue casket
description: Any 3rd age or Gilded counts.

name: Obtain a Tome
description: Tome of Fire, Tome of Water, or Tome of Earth.

name: Get an Araxyte fang
Obtain three Crystal Armour Seeds
Obtain one purple from each Raid
Obtain one of the following: Mutagen (Zulrah), Dragon Axe (WT), Dragon Harpoon (Temp), Dark Totem (Skotizo)
Obtain Bran from the Royal Titans
Obtain an Armadyl crossbow
Obtain a full set of Raid armour (Can be mixed)
description: Must obtain 1 Hat, 1 Top, and 1 Bottom armor piece from any of the three raids. Example: Ancestral hat, Justiciar Top, Ancestral Bottoms.

name: Obtain any Nex unique
JARS (THREE OF THEM)
description: Jars must be unique.

name: Receive the Ham Joint or Flared Trousers from an easy clue scroll
Obtain a Bottomless Compost Bucket
Obtain 3 Unsired
Obtain full Sunfire Fanatic Armour
Obtain a boss pet with a drop rate of 1/4000 or more
description: Includes: DKS, Corp, GWD bosses (except Nex), WT, Temp, Zulrah

name: Fish Barrel! - Obtain a Fish Barrel from Tempoross
description: Or obtain 25 soaked pages twice.

name: Obtain any Virtus piece
Obtain the Magic Fang from Zulrah
Obtain any Mega Rare from a raid
Obtain a Raid pet
description: Obtain a pet from one of the 4 raids: Cox, Tob, Toa, BA

name: Obtain the Dragon Hunter Wand OR Hydra's Claw
The Raevid Tile - Obtain the burning claws as a team
description: Obtain two burning claw total.

name: First time Inferno or Colosseum completion
description: Must be done by a player who has 0 completions across all accounts. (Not including leagues/DMM)

name: Receive three purples from Tombs of Amascut
The Tuna Tile - Obtain an 'afkable' pet.
description: King Black Dragon, Callisto/Artio, Heron, Rock Golem, Beaver, Abyssal Protector, Sarachia, Scurry. If you can argue to me that it is afkable, I will allow it.

name: Obtain a Moon Key as a team
description: Obtain the Tooth half, and Loop half of the key as a team.

name: Obtain a Black tourmaline core from GGs
Obtain three Crystal Weapon Seeds from Corrupted Gauntlet or the Gauntlet
Receive two purples from Theatre of Blood
Obtain the Soul Reaper's Axe as a team
Obtain any of the three Revenant weapons
Obtain any unique from Vorkath (Excluding Vorkath's Head)
description: Includes: Dragonbone necklace, Jar, pet, and visages

name: Immense Wealth: Obtain a Sheild Left half from a boss.
Obtain the Holy elixir from Corp
Obtain a Twisted Bow, Scythe, or Shadow
Complete a Barrows Set as a team
description: Must be a single full set.

name: The Jinx Tile - Obtain a Zamorak Hilt
Obtain the Ring of Endurance
Obtain any Unique from PNM (Exlcudes Egg, and Tablet)
Obtain a Dragonic visage of any kind
Full Guild Hunter Outfit or Quetzin
description: Obtain 4 pieces of the hunter outfit, or the pet.

name: One Rangers - Obtain a pair of Ranger Boots
Classic Bosses, New Items - Obtain a Dragon Pickaxe from KQ or KBD
Obtain a Twisted ancestral colour kit
Obtain a HMT unique
description: Includes Sanguine Dust, Holy Ornament Kit, and Sanguine Ornament Kit

name: Complete the Void Waker as a team
Complete a Godsword blade
Defense Drainer: Obtain a Dragon Warhammer, Bandos Godsword, or Eldermaul
Offhands: Obtain a Elidinis' Ward, Avernic Defender Hilt, or Twisted Buckler
Obtain the Dragon Full Helm
Obtain the Hill Giant Club or Bryophyta's essence
Obtain a skilling pet
description: Players with 200m xp in a skill are not eligible for this tile.

name: Obtain an Eternal Gem or Imbued Heart
Obtain a Wave based Pet
description: Includes Colo, Inferno, Jad, BA, but not Tempoross.

name: Obtain the Odium ward as a team
Obtain 4 Sarachnis Cudgels
Obtain 2 Chromium Ingots
description: Must be from one of the four DT2 bosses.

name: Get a collection log from one of the following items: Torn Prayer Scroll, Vial of Blood, or Thread of Elidinis
description: Can not be an alt, and can not be a player with large raid completions on other accounts

name: Obtain a piece of Torva
Obtain any unique from Zalcano
description: Includes Crystal tool seed, Zalcano Shard, Smolcano, and Uncut onyx

name: Obtain 2 Unique Crystals or Stones from Cerberus
description: Includes: Eternal, Pegasian, Primordial, Smouldering Stone. Must be unique.

name: Obtain a duplicate Thread of Elidinis
Betray a teammate - Pirate Hook from Scratch
description: I'd recommend picking your least favorite teammate and sending them to the Brim dungeon for about 13 hours.

name: Obtain Full Infinity Robes
description: Post a screenshot of your points before you start. Complete the set as a team. You do not need to purchase the items, you can just show the points earned.

name: Obtain 3 Venator Shards
Obtain full Bandos from General Garage Door
Obtain three Crystal Armour Seeds
Obtain an Arcane Prayer Scroll from Chambers of Xeric
